name: AppSourceCop for OnPrem
description: Disables all non-applical rules of AppSourceCop to be used on on-premise projects.

rules.justification: Allow app id ranges for per-tenant extensions.
On-premise projects can have missing DataClassification property.
Leaving app manifest properties blank is allowed on on-premise applications.
Leaving app manifest properties blank is allowed on on-premise applications.
Mandatory affixes are not required for on-premise application.
Tables 'Permission' and 'Premission Set' are not read-only on on-premise server instances.
PTE applications use a different id range.
Azure Application Insights is not applicable to PTE projects.
We don't use app-level permission sets.
